reviewText:
Cute graphics, relaxing atmosphere. Nice polish on the interface.
The gameplay is simple, click on a shape to shift it a direction or remove it.
Some of the shapes have a countdown timer, you have to keep removing those or else.
However because you don't have perfect control over the direction, you have to plan.
Sometimes it seems impossible, but more than once I realized some way to clear the skulls right on time. Those little moments feel satisfying.
However just as often you feel screwed that you randomly didn't get the right shapes and have no chance of clearing them in time. You could play perfectly and still lose, that kind of sucks.
There some hint at a story of a wierd glitchy AI trying to escape, it makes you want to keep playing.

Overall it's exactly what you would expect, a shiney puzzle game.
I bit the bullet for $7, and I'm not quite sure it's worth that much. If you love puzzle games then go for it, otherwise wait for a sale.

很棒的三消游戏，配色看起来很舒服，音乐也很不错~
有不同的方块，每一关都有不同的任务，难度递增，挺上瘾的，关卡再多点就好了~

Nice graphics and relaxing music!
Fine puzzle and challenges!
The match 3 game here is ok, but the challenge puzzles are where this game really shines.  A huge recommendation if you like any of the other games by Fallen Tree.

Nice little game that gets you thinking but is relaxing to play. Works really well with touchscreen.\nThe only downside is you end up relying on luck in the hardmode levels.\nThere's also a small story hint which is nice, but rather pointless.

reviewText: This is what would happen if Max Headroom made Bejeweled, swear down.

A simple relaxing puzzle game. The design of it is easy on the eyes and there isn't a confusion on what to do. There is a tutorial, but what more can you say about a puzzle that is just matching. It is quite fun and challenging. I want to say it is easy because I got high scores a lot on the global matches, but who knooows.

I just want all the achievements.

If you want a relaxing puzzle game that throws you skulls and weird eye shapes then it's a game for you ; u ; I really like it, but its more of a one time game and you should get it for free or really cheap.

Tip: Even though the skulls are annoying and can become a hassle to the challenge itself; focus on the challenge and just keep a watchful eye on the countdowns... because if you are just trying to beat the countdown you will be setting yourself up for a failure.

Product received for free

8.4/10 Smooth Jazz is Smooth -IGN
